com.vangav.backend.cassandra

Class CassandraProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.properties.PropertiesFile
      • com.vangav.backend.cassandra.CassandraProperties

  • public class CassandraProperties
extends PropertiesFile
    CassandraProperties defines how this backend instance deals with Cassandra e.g.: - Cassandra's deployement topology - connection/query retries - mode (dev, beta, prod, ...) - etc ...
